div.p: I am a mobile developer with more than 5 years of experience in developing projects using a wide range of technologies. For now, I am officially employed as a Flutter developer at Russian Agricultural Bank (Россельхозбанк). Previously, I was working as an Android / KMP developer at Rutube.

I believe that theory and practice are inseparable, so I back up my knowledge with competent technical literature and create projects in various spheres. For now, I am focused on Flutter and Kotlin Multiplatform development.
As for my main interests in Compute Science, I am passionate about system programming, functional and reactive paradigms, high-performance computing and native and cross-platform development.
